project.description: Check network latency by ssh or ping

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: env_parameters
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: export CHECK_METHOD="ssh" export TIMEOUT_THRESHOLD_MS="1000" export ssh_key_file="/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa" export connect_key_file="/root/.ssh/test_id_rsa"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v1" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_jenkins/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="network/network_latency_report.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins/$download_file"
